author: lightclient
content:
Hi, if client teams have a chance to review the PR to remove ssz from 4844 before the call on thursday I think it would help us have the most useful discussion on the call: https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6985

this _seems_ to push rlp into the CL (I hear they aren't fond of this), so I also had an idea to avoid doing so and use the engine api as the dmz for this data: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/3345#issuecomment-1535349356

author: potuz
content: left some feedback Matt, I see both approaches as a big drawback, however, extending the sidecar is not as bad as moving RLP into the CL
